workstation.title: AI Workstation
workstation.description: Use artificial intelligence technology for image editing, restoration, and generation. Upload images and describe the effects you want, and AI will create amazing results for you.

image_upload.title: Image (Optional)
image_upload.url_help: Enter image URL and press Enter or click the + button to add
image_upload.file_types: PNG, JPG, JPEG or WEBP (max 10MB each)

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: Describe how your image should look like...

count.title: Number of Images
count.description: Select how many images to generate

results.title: Results
results.description: The modified image results will appear here.
results.before_after_tip: Drag the center line to compare Before/After

errors.no_prompt_or_image: Please upload an image or enter a prompt to generate results.
errors.insufficient_credits_detailed: Insufficient credits or loading failed, {credits} credits required to generate images. Please refresh credits or recharge first.
errors.invalid_url: Failed to load image from URL. Please check the URL and try again.
errors.frequent_submissions: Please do not submit too frequently, try again later
errors.credits_loading_failed: Credits loading failed, please check network connection
errors.network_error: Network error, please try again later

credits.insufficient_recharge: Insufficient credits, please recharge to get more credits
